definitions.definition: Previous caution or care; caution previously employed to prevent misfortune or to secure good
examples: his life was saved by precaution

definitions.definition: A measure taken beforehand to ward off evil or secure good or success; a precautionary act.
examples: to take precautions against risks of accident

main_definition: Previous caution or care; caution previously employed to prevent misfortune or to secure good
secondary_definitions: A measure taken beforehand to ward off evil or secure good or success; a precautionary act.
